spec.rawSql: SELECT timestamp as "time", timestamp, metric, value FROM "pvwr"."pvwr" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( metric = 'stats_total_total_home_consumption' ) ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT timestamp as "time", timestamp, metric, value FROM "pvwr"."pvwr" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( metric = 'house_home_consumption_covered_by_solar_generator' ) ORDER BY timestamp ASC

SELECT timestamp as "time", timestamp, metric, value FROM "pvwr"."pvwr" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( metric = 'pv_generator_dc_input_1_power' ) ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT timestamp as "time", timestamp, metric, value FROM "pvwr"."pvwr" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) AND ( metric = 'house_home_consumption_covered_by_solar_generator' ) ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
    toDate(timestamp) AS day,
    max(value) - min(value) AS daily_yield_change
FROM pvwr.pvwr
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR
    AND metric = 'stats_total_yield'
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

SELECT
    toDate(timestamp) AS day,
    max(value) - min(value) AS daily_yield_change
FROM pvwr.pvwr
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR
    AND metric = 'stats_total_self_consumption_kwh'
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

SELECT
    toStartOfWeek(timestamp) AS week,
    max(value) - min(value) AS weekly_yield_change
FROM pvwr.pvwr
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR
    AND metric = 'stats_total_yield'
GROUP BY week
ORDER BY week
